content: specified maximum age, then automatically purged. /*** CRONSVM PROFILE EXEC A : CRONSVM 191 -- MOD 2020-09-19 PWNOVAK ***/ 'CP SET RUN ON' 'CP SPOOL CONSOLE CLOSE' 'CP MSG OPERATOR LOGON 'USERID()' FOR VMCRON TIMED' 'CP SPOOL CONSOLE TO VMLOGS START NAME' USERID() ]CONSOLE] 'ACCESS 193 U' 'ACCESS 592 X' 'EXEC VMCRON' 216 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 Directing all console logs to VMLOGS creates a centralized way of monitoring system-wide activities, including Linux virtual machines. Complete the following steps: 1. Log on as MAINT or MAINT720 on any cluster member if you are not logged on. 2. Create the following directory entry by using the following command. ===> xedit vmlogs direct a Enter the information shown in Example 6-24. Enter your own user IDs on the line with LOGONBY. Example 6-24 VMLOGS directory entry USER VMLOGS LBYONLY 64M 128M ABDEG INCLUDE IBMDFLT IPL CMS PARM AUTOCR LOGONBY AUTOLOG1 BG FMIRANDA KWERNER PARZIALE PWNOVAK SPIEDIE MACH ESA LINK OPERATOR
